definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
eyewitness (to an incident)/witness (to a legal transaction)

pinyin: Ye1 he2 hua2 Jian4 zheng4 ren2

sentences.english: The NT testifies about Jesus Christ who has already come .
This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 這耶穌，神已經叫他復活了，我們都爲這事作見證。

sentences.english: The sapling that bears our mark of love has grown into a big tree
sentences.chinese: 刻下愛的見證的小樹，已長成大樹。

sentences.english: WE bear witness to ourselves in mirrors.
sentences.chinese: 我們都是在鏡子中見證着我們自己。

sentences.english: Recent history has witnessed the exciting politicization of meat.
sentences.chinese: 近代歷史見證了肉食品的政治化。

sentences.english: To Marc Chagall, the marriage with Bella Rosenfeld, his life, bears the best witness to love and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 與妻子蓓拉的婚姻，是夏卡爾感受愛與美最好的見證。

sentences.english: Do you share what God is doing in your life with your spouse, and visa-versa?
sentences.chinese: 你們彼此分享上帝在你們生命中的見證嗎？

sentences.english: The beautiful topiary trees are witnesses of our marriage.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫鮮花柱見證我們的婚盟約誓。

sentences.english: But this witness must come from a heart that is willing to give without getting anything in return.
sentences.chinese: 但是見證者必鬚髮自內心的只求付出不求回報。

sentences.english: The hands of the witnesses must be the first in putting him to death, and then the hands of all the people.
sentences.chinese: 見證人要先下手，然後衆民也下手將他治死。

sentences.english: Your life will not go unwitnessed , because I will be your witness.
sentences.chinese: 你的生命不會沒有見證，因爲我在見證。

sentences.english: Your life will not go unwitnessed , because I will be your witness.
sentences.chinese: 你的生命不會沒有見證，因爲我在見證。

sentences.english: Practice repeatedly proves that history is the most telling witness.
sentences.chinese: 實踐反覆證明歷史是最有力的見證人。

sentences.english: Let me see you become the NO. 1 player, brother.
sentences.chinese: 讓我見證你成爲頭號選手的那一刻吧，兄弟。

sentences.english: Carter witnessed the explosion at Trinity, a site in rural New Mexico where an experimental bomb was set off.
sentences.chinese: 卡特見證了那天在新墨西哥鄉村的爆炸。

sentences.english: One who gives false witness against his neighbour is a hammer and a sword and a sharp arrow.
sentences.chinese: 作假見證陷害鄰舍的，就是大槌，是利刀，是快箭。

definition: to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
